title: Katie Price's ex hints they're meeting up despite reports she's back with Kris
text:

Katie Price 's ex Charles Drury has been dropping hints that they're meeting up - despite reports she's back with Kris Boyson.

It was reported earlier today that the former glamour model was back with fiancé Kris and that he'd already started moving his stuff back into her mansion as it undergoes renovations.

Katie dumped Kris back in August after she met Charles while he was working on her home, but the short-lived romance ended and it was said she'd reconciled with Kris.

But today, Charles has been dropping some serious hints on social media that he's organised a meeting with the Pricey.

She posted an old picture of herself on a book tour and said: "Major throwback! What cities shall Pricey visit next? comment below & I may just see you very soon"

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Charles took to the comment section to suggest "Nottingham" adding a winking emoji for good measure.

Around the same time, he took to his Instagram story to share a video of himself walking through what appears to be a shopping centre, tagging his location as Nottingham.

Sources say Katie and personal trainer Kris are smitten once again after getting back together.

(Image: Instagram)

A source told The Sun : "He's taken her back and they're already moving some of his things back into the house.

"They're officially back on - everyone's shocked that he didn't make it harder for her, but they're back to being loved-up again like they never split up."

Their reunion comes not long after she was seen sneaking out of his house one morning and reports she's unfollowed Charles on social media.

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

However, at the time of writing, Katie and Charles follow each other on Instagram.

Katie's representatives did not want to comment.

description: Builder Charles Drury dropped hints on social media that he was meeting up with his ex, even though it's said she's back with Kris Boyson
